author: DecayingDev/DairyFreeLemon
description:
Uses JSON Model Loader to automatically load models on map load. You must also be using the JSON Model Loader plugin. 

To use this plugin, in an event name have '<model:x>', replacing x with the model name + .json extension. For example if my model is called chad.json, I would use <model:chad.json>.
name: Model Load on Map Load
